Hi Kristen,  thanks for your question! 
I found some links that might be resourceful to you. 
Here is a link to a presentation on market based revenue opportunities from the League of California Cities.
icma.org/Documents/QuestionAnswer/Document/10664
I've found a link to a revenue guide for local government from Robert Bland at the University of North Texas.
bookstore.icma.org/freedocs/Rev_Guide_Presentation.ppt 
Read more about ICMA's financial management practices here.  
http://icma.org/en/international/services/expertise/financial_management
If you are looking for a professional organization to produce statistical analysis, check out ICMA's opportunities for research with your local government.
http://icma.org/en/results/home/surveying
I hope these links help answer your question. 
Hilary Badger
Knowledge Network, Intern
ICMA
